about: Full Stack Web Developer and graduate from UCF Coding Bootcamp. Being a natural problem solver gave me a huge passion for being a developer, fixing broken code is something I have greatly enjoyed as there's no error I haven't been able to come up with a solution for. Among the many other things I love is how much collaboration is involved in making a perfect app, working with others not only helps you to improve but also gives the same opportunities for others.
One of the top skills I have been perfecting is mobile responsiveness, I feel this is an important and fundamental skill to make sure any application stands out from others.
